Detailed Description

template<class T>
class tvector< T >

Array class with debugging support and std::vector-compatible methods.

Extra method: erase(T);

Version:
0.3, 02/05/2003
Author:
Peter Csizmadia (1993-95,99-2001)

Sen Cheng (2001)
